name: PTSD Screener (PC-PTSD-5 style)
description: Brief 5-item PTSD symptom screener covering core symptom clusters. Follows PC-PTSD-5 format. Used when trauma exposure is endorsed.

items.text: If you experienced one of more traumatic experiences listed above, does this event/trauma currently interfere with your life?
Had nightmares about it or thought about it when you did not want to?
Tried hard not to think about it or went out of your way to avoid situations that reminded you of it?
Constantly been on guard, watchful, or easily startled?
Felt numb or detached from others, activities, or your surroundings?

interpretations.label: Screen Positive
interpretations.description: Probable PTSD - full clinical assessment recommended
